name: Star Virtual Office
description:
We are an outsourced contact centre, specialising mainly in taking inbound calls on behalf of our many clients.   We can patch important callers through to you, or simply take the details and send you an email and/or SMS: you decide what works best for you. We also do outbound, but not cold calling: we don't like it, and we suspect your potential customers wouldn't either.  Our clients range from one-person businesses to global companies.
 We work for solicitors, complementary medical practitioners, domestic cleaning companies, voice coaches, polythene importers, mobile phone providers, boiler fitters, IT support guys – the variations are  endless.
